translations: n.小牛或小羊的胸腺（等于 neck sweetbread 或 throat sweetbread）；小牛或小羊的胰脏（等于 stomach sweetbread）

phrs.translation: 小牛, 是“胰脏, 而不是“面包, 甜面包

sentences.sentence: Food Matching: Sweetbread, kidney veal, Parma ham, rack of lamb with little vegetable, poultry and game bird.
sentences.translation: 食物搭配：小牛腰子，帕尔玛火腿，羊排，禽类。

sentences.sentence: Sally was going to get permission to stay with us a little and one Thursday she came finally with a sack full of clothes and a paper bag of sweetbread her mama sent.
sentences.translation: 萨莉得到了允许讲和我们住一阵子，星期四她终于来了，带着一布袋衣服和一纸袋她妈妈拿的甜面包。
